message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.SI 

This paper proposes a unifying model of adversarial examples suitable for NLP tasks in both generative and classification settings. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses control theory and manifold theory, which are relevant to machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely categories as well. The paper also discusses defenses against attacks, which falls under the category of cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Finally, the paper proposes a measure of change in the output of a system, which can be seen as a form of evaluation, making cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) a possible category as well.
